TopicTitle: Newbie question re plugins on Macbook

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Sorry if this is a silly question ... only had the game a few weeks and want to try some plugins. I'm running KSP on my new MacBook, but never had a Mac before and can't even find my KSP plugins folder to unzip into, so two questions please:

- do plugins work on Mac?

- where on earth are the program folders on a MacBook????

Thanks in advance....

1. Yes

2. No idea, have you tried the search function in Finder?

Thanks for the reply.. yes I had used the search function, but it found nothing. But I found the answer myself eventually:

http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2525494

In Lion, Apple have cleverly hidden the library... you need to press the option key when you're in 'go' and it'll magically appear. Easy to remember that....
